definition: to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate
to carry/to convey/to load/to hold/to fill up/and/also/as well as/simultaneously
to record in writing/to carry (i.e. publish in a newspaper etc)/Taiwan pr. [zai4]/year

sentences.english: We'll start loading as soon as you confirm the pre-stowage plan.
sentences.chinese: 一旦您確認配載圖我們就開始作業。

sentences.english: Except for the tentativesketchinitialdraftrough cargo plan everything is ready for loading.
sentences.chinese: 除了配載草圖，一切都爲裝貨準備好了。

sentences.english: The stowage planner is compiling the loading plan. Please wait a moment.
sentences.chinese: 配載計劃員正在編制裝船積載圖，請稍等片刻。

sentences.english: So far, the optimum model of stowage has been established.
sentences.chinese: 到此爲止，配載方案的優化模型也建立完畢。

sentences.english: Cargo is not enough ,so we can not meet your stowage plan.
sentences.chinese: 貨不足，因此無法達到您的配載要求。

sentences.english: I've got the loading list and the stowage plan.
sentences.chinese: 我拿到了裝貨清單和配載圖。
輕鬆查看船舶配載流程。

sentences.english: Based on automatic stowage, manual fine adjustment is also included.
sentences.chinese: 在自動配載的基礎上增加了手動微調的功能。

sentences.english: Please tell the dockers to stow the cargoes according to the stowage plan.
sentences.chinese: 請告訴裝卸工人要依照配載圖裝貨。

definition: to load or unload/to transfer/to assemble and disassemble
to run in parallel without hindrance/not mutually exclusive/two processes can be implemented without conflict
